name: Jblocker Level Editor
description:
This is a simple level editor for jblocker which can be used instead of using any other image manipulation software.

The main difference over this and using ms-paint is that all the correct colors are already pre-defined.I also just wanted to create my own "level editor", even if its just a weird pixelart creator.

The only problem i had was saving the images , because the html canvas , which i used for painting , would not save all the colors 100% accurate (slightly different). Which isnt a problem normally, but jblocker needs the exact right color for it to work.
